-- | Colorized looms for Anansi
--   
--   Colorized looms for Anansi
@package anansi-hscolour
@version 0.1.1

module Anansi.HsColour
loomHTML :: Loom
loomLaTeX :: Loom

-- | Looms which use HsColour to produce colorized code blocks.
--   
--   Use this with <a>defaultMain</a>:
--   
--   <pre>
--   #!/usr/bin/env runhaskell
--   import Anansi
--   import Anansi.HsColour
--   import Data.Map
--   
--   main = defaultMain (unions [Anansi.looms, Anansi.HsColour.looms])
--   </pre>
looms :: Map Text Loom
